inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 50, "index": 12}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 42, "index": 35}]
thought: I need to craft 3 white_carpet first, so I will move the white_wool at slot 16 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
